Description:
(Repeatable for a maximum of 8 credit hours) rehearsal,coaching and performance of representative chamber
 repertoire from the baroque era through the twentieth century. Woodwinds horn strings and piano. Intensive
 daily rehearsal and coaching.

(Repeatable for a maximum of 2 credit hours) study and performance of standard orchestral repertoire and
 common audition requirements. Technical and interpretive approaches relating specifically to orchestral
 performance. Woodwinds horn and strings.
(Repeatable for credit)Offered for specific professional needs. Emphasis on performance and pedagogical skills.
